1.3.1.name: wordpress/sorenson-360
1.3.1.description: When creating or editing posts, a Sorenson 360 icon will appear in the editor toolbar. Clicking this icon will present a list of videos in your Sorenson 360 account. You can then simply choose the embed size of your choice and click the Add to post button. Your video will now be embedded in your blog post.
